references.paper_title: Neural codec language models are zero-shot text to speech synthesizers
references.reason: This paper introduces a novel approach to text-to-speech synthesis that achieves zero-shot capabilities, significantly advancing the field.

references.paper_title: Naturalspeech 3: Zero-shot speech synthesis with factorized codec and diffusion models
references.reason: This work presents Naturalspeech 3, a state-of-the-art model that demonstrates significant improvements in zero-shot speech generation.

references.paper_title: Voicebox: Text-guided multilingual universal speech generation at scale
references.reason: Voicebox is a groundbreaking model achieving multilingual universal speech generation at scale, setting a new benchmark for the field.

references.paper_title: Base TTS: Lessons from building a billion-parameter text-to-speech model on 100k hours of data
